resources.string: Improve your understanding of the study of the economy, the study of the coordination process, the study of the effects of scarcity, the science of choice, and the study of human behavior. Improve your understanding of economics.

CONTENT 
 - Compounding 
 - Present Value and Discounting 
 - Annuities 
 - Loan Amortization 
 - Exchange Rates

DESCRIPTION\nFinancial decisions involve costs and benefits that are spread over time. Should we take a loan for a new car? Time value of money states that a dollar is today worth more than tomorrow for at least three reasons: it can be invested and earn an interest; inflation reduces future value of money; future is uncertain.
Time Value of Money and Discounting
OBJECTIVE \n - To explain the concepts of compounding, discounting, future value and present value \n - To show how these concepts are applied in making financial decisions
